context: Motorola Solutions, Inc. is a communications and analytics company focused on land mobile radio, public safety, and command center software. Command center software. Avigilon video analytics.

competitors.name: Hytera Communications
competitors.notes: Chinese competitor in two-way radio systems; subject of major lawsuit resulting in $764M award to Motorola in 2020

competitors.name: L3Harris Technologies
competitors.notes: Major competitor in public safety and defense communications

competitors.name: Ericsson
competitors.notes: Competitor in telecommunications and communications equipment

competitors.name: Zebra Technologies
competitors.notes: Competitor in enterprise mobility and data capture solutions
